company_info.description: Chugin Financial Group,Inc., through its subsidiary The Chugoku Bank, Limited, provides various financial services to corporate and individual customers in Japan. It operates through Banking, Leasing, and Securities segments. The Banking segment offers financial services, such as deposit taking and lending services. The Leasing segment engages in leasing services, and installment sales of properties and goods. The Securities segment offers brokerage services for financial instruments. The company also provides loans; exchanges; direct debits; public money services; and business processing, and document management of investment trusts. In addition, it is involved in credit guarantee, credit card, asset management, securities, regional trading, fund operation and management, regional energy and decarbonization, fee-charging employment placement, and consulting businesses. Chugin Financial Group,Inc. was incorporated in 2022 and is headquartered in Okayama, Japan.
